content: Projects Ronen I. Brafman The Scharf-Ullman Chair in Computer Science Publications |  CV Address: Department of Computer Science Ben-Gurion University P.O. Box 653 Beer-Sheva, 84105 Israel brafman@cs.bgu.ac.il Office: Bld 37, Room 209 Phone: 08-6428041 Fax: 08-6472909 About My Work My academic research spans areas such as classical and decision-theoretic planning and decision-making, preference modeling, robotics, reinforcement learning, and multi-agent and distributed planning. My consulting work involves business process automation and integration, real-time event monitoring and analysis, user interfaces for e-commerce, algorithms for autonomous exploration for NASA's rovers, satellite mission scheduling, and real-time decision-making.
